name: Grognardsfromhell.GitHub.io
body:
## Welcome to the Grognards From Hell webpage.
Home of the TemplePlus mod for Troika's Temple of Elemental Evil (ToEE).

## Get ToEE
If you don't have it already, you can buy ToEE from GoG Games: https://www.gog.com/game/the_temple_of_elemental_evil

## What is TemplePlus?

TemplePlus (a.k.a Temple+) is an engine enhancement & bugfixes mod for Temple of Elemental Evil.

#Primary features:
* Support for HD resolutions
* Compatibility with Win10
* Faster loading time
* New Feats
* New class features for levels 11+
* New Tactical combat options
* Gameplay Enhancements, such as flexible PC/NPC party composition
* AI improvements
* Pathfinding improvements
* Many UI / convenience features, such Alt-Click to quickly sell items
* ... and many, many BUGFIXES!

## Download
Temple+ will be officially released on April 1st. No joke :) It will be available on our ModDB page.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
